title: Elegant City Escape with Exclusive Club Lounge Access
description: Embrace the electric atmosphere and modern flair of Singapore staying at the recently renovated Grand Park City Hall, a modern and elegant hotel occupying a prime location in the heart of the city. Discover everything this electrifying city has on offer while enjoying deluxe daily breakfast, a multi-course dining experience at Tablescape, a late 2pm checkout and exclusive access to the Crystal Club Lounge - a sanctuary of peace above the city. Make it an unforgettable family holiday: two kids stay for free with breakfast included.
